version_description:
New features：

We are devoting ourselves to the best train booking service in UK. Each release makes it more convenient and reliable to buy cheap train tickets.

Here is the new feature in this release:
Sign up the app and you will get a package of coupons!

If you love the app, please leave us a review. It will help us to improve the app and serve you better.

Wish you a pleasant journey!

We are devoting ourselves to the best train booking service in UK. Each release makes it more convenient and reliable to buy cheap train tickets.

Here are the new features in this release:
- Split tickets: try to find cheapest split journey with our new smart engine!
- Release Mobile tickets: release m-tickets from one device and use it in another device.

If you love the app, please leave us a review. It will help us to improve the app and serve you better.

Wish you a pleasant journey!

We are devoted to becoming the best train booking service in the UK.

With each new release, it gets easier to buy cheaper train tickets with us. Here are the new features in this release:
- Split tickets: Open return split ticketing is available now. More solutions for saving money on train tickets.
- E-ticket: no need to queue up at stations.
- More bugs fixed for a better train booking experience

If you like what we’re doing or have any suggestions for us, please leave us a review. This will help us improve the app, improving your experience too.

We wish you a pleasant journey.

Christmas is coming!
+ UK Coaches: Book and compare cheap UK coach tickets from National Express, Stagecoach UK, Megabus, Arriva Bus&Coach and other coach operators. Taking coaches directly to Airports, from the heart of London/Oxford/Lewknor to London Stansted Airport, London Gatwick Airport and London Heathrow Airport.

+ Germany Trains: Plan your next trip to Germany and buy train tickets on TrainPal now.
